1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Message
4  ( adlib,
5    bug,
6    unsupported,
7  ) where
8
9import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort    as B
10
11-- | BUG: reason
12bug :: String -> B.Ab a
13bug reason = Left $ B.abortBecause $ "BUG: " ++ reason
14
15-- | AD-LIB: reason
16adlib :: String -> B.Ab a
17adlib reason = Left $ B.abortBecause $ "AD-LIB: " ++ reason
18
19-- | Unsupported feature
20unsupported :: String -> B.Ab a
21unsupported = Left . B.abortLine "Unsupported feature"
22
